name: Machine Assembly Line
title: Machine Assembly Line
desc: Countless widgets, heated and forged, eventually go into making these exceptional machines, and to the inmates of the Fortress of Meropide, they mean valuable Credit Coupons...

skills.desc:
Each time after your character is targeted by and takes DMG or is healed: Accumulate 1 point of Battle-Readiness (Max 2 points).
When you play a Weapon or Artifact with an original cost of no more Dice than you have Battle-Readiness points: Clear all Battle-Readiness points and play that card for free.
